full_summary:
---------------

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Reference Number

* WS4158936152-Doc4440934576

#### Solicitation Number

* WS4158936152

#### Tender Title

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to participate in the Lunar Exploration Accelerator Program (LEAP) Science Instruments Phases ABCDEF.

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-13
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-04-22T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-04-12

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
* **Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Contract End Date**: N/A

#### Tender Requirement

The successful contractor will be required to supply Science Instruments Phases ABCDEF for the Lunar Exploration Accelerator Program (LEAP).

#### Evaluation Criteria

* **Highest Technical Merit within a Stipulated Maximum Budget**

#### Postal Information

* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End-User Entity Address**: 6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Quebec, J3Y 8Y9, Canada

#### Contact Information

* **Contractor Representative**: Sameer Ali Abbasi (TPSGC/PSPC) - sameerali.abbasi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL and Attachments

* **Tender Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18782517

All responses submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the submission being declared non-responsive.

### Note

Please disregard the SAP Business Network posting (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18782517) response closing time and submit all required supporting documentation and responses by the response deadline time of 14:00 EDT on the response deadline date set for solicitation closing. All responses submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the submission being declared non-responsive. For further information, please refer to the posting at the above-mentioned URL.
